text.content:
Soul-Crushing Blow

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Doomed]{Doomed 1} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} for as long as it is doomed.

Bludgeoning

Knockback

The target is pushed 10 feet.

Piercing

Armor Damage

The target's armor also takes the damage (applying the armor's Hardness normally).

Slashing

Draining Strike

The target loses one random prepared spell or spell slot, as determined by the GM.

Bomb or Spell
